titleInfo.title: The first 3-methanediyl-1,3,5,6-tetraphosphabicyclo[3.1.0]hex-2-ene. Evidence for a [3 + 2] cycloaddition of a 2,4,5,6-tetraphosphahepta-1,3,6-triene

mods.abstract: Reaction of ([eta]5C5Me5)(CO)2 FeP(SiMe3)2 with three equivalents of Cl–P[doublebond]C(SiMe3)2 affords the first 3-methanediyl-1,3,5,6-tetraphosphabicyclo[3.1.0.]hex-2-ene 7, the molecular structure of which has been determined by X-ray analysis.

titleInfo.title: Journal of the Chemical Society, Chemical Communications

Evidence for a [3 + 2] cycloaddition of a 2,4,5,6-tetraphosphahepta-1,3,6-triene Journal of the Chemical Society, Chemical Communications,1992:(11): 819-820.
